Estate

Estate Manager
The Estate Manager is responsible for the overall management of the estate. Must have at least 5 years of experience in estate management. Must have a degree in Agriculture or related field. Must be able to work under pressure. Must be able to work long hours. Must be able to work with a team.
Estate Assistant
The Estate Assistant is responsible for the administrative tasks of the estate.
Estate Security
The Estate Security is responsible for the security of the estate.
Harvest Manager
The Harvest Manager is responsible for the overall management of the harvest operations.
Harvester
The Harvester is responsible for the harvesting of the crops.
Harvest Clerk
The Clerk is responsible for the administrative tasks of the harvest operations.
Recorded Clerk
The Clerk is responsible for the administrative tasks of the harvest operations.
Harvest Foreman
The Foreman is responsible for the overall management of the harvest operations.
Upkeep Manager
The Upkeep Manager is responsible for the overall management of the upkeep operations.
Upkeep Foreman
The Foreman is responsible for the overall management of the upkeep operations.
Upkeep Clerk
The Clerk is responsible for the administrative tasks of the upkeep operations.
Nursery Manager
The Nursery Manager is responsible for the overall management of the nursery operations.
Nursery Foreman
The Foreman is responsible for the overall management of the nursery operations.
